name: Handcraft Blends Moroccan Argan Oil - 8 Fl Oz - 100% Pure and Natural - Premium Grade Carrier Oil for Skin and Hair - Hair and Body - Massage - Cold-Pressed
short_description: 100% PURE AND NATURAL MOROCCAN ARGAN OIL - Our Moroccan Argan Oil is a cold-pressed natural oil derived from Moroccan Argan kernels, known for its ability to provide lightweight nourishment for hair, scalp, and skin.

MOROCCAN ARGAN OIL FOR HAIR CARE - Argan Oil is known for its ability to help improve manageability, soften and smoothen hair, and naturally revitalize dry and dull-looking hair for a healthy appearance.
GENTLE ON SCALP & STRANDS - Argan Oil of Morocco is a versatile oil that moisturizes both scalp and hair, creating a healthy-looking shine without feeling heavy or greasy.

MOISTURIZING SKIN OIL - Moroccan Argan Oil is naturally packed with Vitamin E and fatty acids, making it ideal for hydrating and nourishing the skin. Perfect for adding moisture to nails and cuticles.
IMPORTED FROM MOROCCO - Our Moroccan Argan Oil is paraben-free, chemical-free, cruelty-free, and 100% Vegan, ensuring only high-quality ingredients for your everyday care.

Embrace the indulgent sensation of smooth, soft hair that's effortlessly manageable and radiantly beautiful with every application.
